3ac224a7-728f-4677-91b1-8cdbfcff7009.description: Earners have been trained on what matters in Computer System Validation (CSV) including Computer Software Assurance (CSA) to help their company meet regulatory requirements and mitigate risks to product quality and patient safety.
3ac224a7-728f-4677-91b1-8cdbfcff7009.name: Computer System Validation (SP6516)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete training course SP6516 Principles of Computer System Validation

b4c03ca5-121f-4990-8d4e-2e551f471989.description: Earners have been trained on the knowledge, skills and tools to implement a risk management process in compliance with the ISO 14971:2019 standard as part of a Quality Management System.
b4c03ca5-121f-4990-8d4e-2e551f471989.name: ISO 14971 - Risk Management for Medical Devices (SP6545)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete training course SP6545 ISO 14971 - Risk Management for Medical Devices

4b5297cd-6e59-42ee-99c0-dd41ade0a22a.description: Earners have workshopped how to conduct effective (structured) failure investigations and perform root cause analysis using real-world scenarios. Earners have then trained on how to use the Corrective Action and Preventive Action (CAPA) system, not just to satisfy regulatory requirements, but to implement a closed-loop problem solving system.
4b5297cd-6e59-42ee-99c0-dd41ade0a22a.name: Failure Investigation, Root Cause Analysis and CAPA (SP6505)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete training course SP6505: A Practical Approach to Failure Investigation, Root Cause Analysis and CAPA

167b6b4a-7300-4d58-aafe-3876a03c340c.description: Earners have trained on the duties and responsibilities of Authorised Persons within the context of the Australian regulatory framework and improved their understanding of critical areas including: - Batch Review and decision-making on disposition - GMP and Quality Agreements and the role of auditing and monitoring - Risk-based approach: Critical Quality Attributes (CQAs) & Critical Process Parameters (CPPs).
167b6b4a-7300-4d58-aafe-3876a03c340c.name: Release for Supply - Responsibilities of Authorised Persons (SP6503)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete training course SP6503: Release for Supply - Responsibilities of Authorised Persons

929fe41a-3c12-4ee2-b5e3-f0a5bb153de8.description: Earners have trained on the tools needed to navigate the various validation pathways and get it 'right first time' including: Validation planning, Product validation life cycle, Protocol and report writing, Validation execution, Statistics that prove validation and Maintaining the validated state.
929fe41a-3c12-4ee2-b5e3-f0a5bb153de8.name: Validation (SP6519)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete training course SP6519: Validation - A Roadmap to Get it 'Right First Time'

d6a07f71-66f8-4b30-8a7d-7c17162b1d30.description: Earners have trained on the current regulatory requirements and expectations, along with a 6-step plan for managing supplier quality to start reducing supplier risks and improving compliance.
d6a07f71-66f8-4b30-8a7d-7c17162b1d30.name: Supplier Quality Assurance (SP6511)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete training course SP6511: Building a Successful Supplier Quality Assurance Program - A Strategic Approach

078eab46-5714-45db-83b1-a1b6765a2c8d.description: Earners have trained on key regulatory requirements for the collection, processing and supply of human blood and tissues; focusing on the legal requirements associated with the Manufacturing Licence, product quality standards defined by the Therapeutic Goods Orders (TGOs) and aspects of quality assurance systems and manufacture defined in the relevant code of Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP).
078eab46-5714-45db-83b1-a1b6765a2c8d.name: GMPs for Tissue Banks (SP6532)

alignments.name: Australian Code of Good Manufacturing Practice for human blood and blood components, human tissues and human cellular therapy products

badge_template_activities.title: Complete training course SP6532: GMPs for Tissue Banks

9f18e510-d00e-4e6c-9891-f54d5b9adb13.description: Earners have trained on best practices to write Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs), data collection forms and other documentation/reports including reducing complexity, using process mapping to structure documents and writing clear unambiguous instructions.
9f18e510-d00e-4e6c-9891-f54d5b9adb13.name: Good Writing Practices (SP6528)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete training course SP6528: Good Writing Practices for Efficiency and Error-proofing

a82fdb2d-4317-4348-83f8-ee8684a39449.description: Earners have trained on techniques for preparing audit plans, performing audits, verifying observations, reporting and implementing Corrective and Preventive Action (CAPA).
a82fdb2d-4317-4348-83f8-ee8684a39449.name: Internal Audits and CAPA (SP6515)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete training course SP6515: Internal Audits - A Key to Your Quality System

f2ab4f0b-d99a-44f4-884c-ddc5792f284f.description: Earners have trained on laboratory principles & controls for compliance as well as best practice for Out Of Specification (OOS) event handling.
f2ab4f0b-d99a-44f4-884c-ddc5792f284f.name: Laboratory Control and OOS Handling (SP6533)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete training course SP6533: Laboratory Control and OOS Handling

acf93c29-d969-40ca-8022-67e044eebe4d.description: Earners have trained on critical cleaning validation elements including setting residue limits, cleaning process, cleaning validation strategies, sampling methods, analytical methods, writing protocols and maintaining the validated state.
acf93c29-d969-40ca-8022-67e044eebe4d.name: Cleaning Validation (SP6535)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete training course SP6535: Cleaning Validation

840c69d3-af1e-40bf-ad4a-2fc4c7c5e793.description: Earners have trained on Facility Layout & Design Principles, Design & Construction of Critical Services (Clean Steam & Gases), Water Systems (Design, Control & Validation), Cleanrooms (Design, Control & Qualification), Facility, Equipment & Utilities Qualification and Planned Preventative Maintenance & Calibration.
840c69d3-af1e-40bf-ad4a-2fc4c7c5e793.name: GMP for Engineering (SP6536)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete training course SP6536: GMP for Engineering

0a0187cb-015e-45c5-ae91-6241a863b454.description: Earners have trained on why people don’t comply with procedures, either by error or perhaps deliberately, and what can be done about it. Earners have learnt about three (3) specific modes of human error and where “retraining” can actually help; but why it doesn’t most of the time.
0a0187cb-015e-45c5-ae91-6241a863b454.name: Behavioural GMP - Minimising Human Error (SP6435)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete course SP6435: Behavioural GMP - Minimising Human Error

c29b90cb-9f14-4633-8fa0-b1b3625915c1.description: Earners have trained on identifying GMP data integrity (DI) needs & vulnerabilities and addressing them to reduce regulatory risk: What DI means, Who can contribute to good DI, Why DI and security are hot topics for regulators, Data criticality and data risk, Integration of DI into QMS using a risk-based approach, Protection and security of raw data and original records, Control of data when utilising vendors/ 3rd parties, Developing practical audit and remediation strategies for DI.
c29b90cb-9f14-4633-8fa0-b1b3625915c1.name: Data Integrity (SP6524)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete training course SP6524: GMP Data Integrity - Identify and Address Your Vulnerabilities

564445d3-4257-490d-bf4e-3a3ec9dda15d.description: Earners have trained on the knowledge and skills to effectively participate in process risk assessments. With an understanding of manufacturing processes, how they are controlled the risk assessment process, Earners have a basis from which to conduct structured risk evaluations.
564445d3-4257-490d-bf4e-3a3ec9dda15d.name: Quality Risk Management (SP6507)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete training course SP6507: Quality Risk Management

4b678ebf-f7f6-46be-bc41-cf131ce23fda.description: Earners have trained on the new (2022) structure of the EU and PIC/S GMP Guide Annex 1 and focused on major changes for Quality Risk Management, Contamination Control Strategy (CCS), Production and new technologies, Personnel controls such as gowning and training, Environmental Monitoring (EM) and the importance of trending, Premises including cleaning and disinfection and Equipment and utilities including water systems.
4b678ebf-f7f6-46be-bc41-cf131ce23fda.name: Changes to Annex 1 - Manufacture of Sterile Medicinal Products (SP6530)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete training course SP6530: Changes to Annex 1 - Manufacture of Sterile Medicinal Products

4a3c466a-e5d6-4e78-ad09-0facaaffadb6.description: Earners have been trained on "PIC/S Guide to Good Manufacturing Practice for Medicinal Products" Part I, version 15 (PE 009-15). Stepping through the key requirements of the PIC/S Guide to GMP using case studies and industry examples, Earners learn the GMP rules and how they are applied to manufacturing environment(s), with a focus on ensuring product quality and the prevention of adulteration and misbranding.
4a3c466a-e5d6-4e78-ad09-0facaaffadb6.name: PIC/S GMP: PE 009-15 (SP6510)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete training course SP6510: GMP - What You Need to Know

02cd84ed-3539-446a-9ea3-ef232097faab.description: Earners have been trained on Australian Pharmacovigilance Requirements (Definitions, Legislation, Scope, Reporting), Periodic Safety Update Reports, Signal Detection and Safety Profile, Customer Complaints, Recalls and Market Withdrawal.
02cd84ed-3539-446a-9ea3-ef232097faab.name: Post Market Monitoring and Pharmacovigilance (SP6518)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete training course SP6518: Post Market Monitoring and Pharmacovigilance

d5c46cbb-d48e-4dfd-a666-7127a11cc99e.description: Earners have trained on key areas to focus on when preparing for a regulatory inspection, differences between approaches of the US FDA, EU and TGA, how to best handle responses to observations / findings from a GMP Inspection, differences in remote inspections (compared to on-site inspections) and the Pharmacovigilance Inspection Program (PVIP).
d5c46cbb-d48e-4dfd-a666-7127a11cc99e.name: Preparing for a Regulatory Inspection/Audit (SP6538)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete training course SP6538: How to Prepare for an Inspection / Audit

429d191c-9442-4342-8a83-57e36d58a01b.description: Earners have been trained to have a good understanding of contamination and how to control it in a GMP environment.
429d191c-9442-4342-8a83-57e36d58a01b.name: Contamination Control (SP6537)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete training course SP6537: Contamination Control

22b1e305-a363-42c5-82a3-bc8fbd1f16ad.description: Earners have trained on Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP) and how it applies to the warehouse, codes of practice for GMP and GWP and what 'compliance' means to warehouse operations (including goods receipt > controls > records > housekeeping > returns and recalls).
22b1e305-a363-42c5-82a3-bc8fbd1f16ad.name: Good Warehouse Practice (SP6527)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete training course SP6527: Good Warehouse Practice for GMP Organisations

7a74a439-7df3-48f8-826d-bdd1e50e773f.description: Earners have trained on the guidelines, tools and procedures to conduct effective Product Quality Reviews (PQRs) which will support GMP compliance, improve decision-making quality and help determine the adequacy of the manufacturing controls and product specifications.
7a74a439-7df3-48f8-826d-bdd1e50e773f.name: Product Quality Reviews (SP6438)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete training course SP6438: How to Conduct Effective Product Quality Reviews

43781382-d1ec-485e-b2b1-8ced53d07c80.description: Earners have been trained on techniques for preparing audit plans, performing audits, verifying observations and reporting in the medical devices space under ISO 13485 regulations.
43781382-d1ec-485e-b2b1-8ced53d07c80.name: Internal Audits for Medical Devices (SP6546)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete training course SP6546: Internal Audits for Medical Devices

b34c4dcd-8571-4aa8-aa5b-03e87a9c085f.description: Earners have been brought up to speed with Industry 4.0 and its application in the healthcare setting to get them thinking about opportunities within their company/industry for innovation and improvement.
b34c4dcd-8571-4aa8-aa5b-03e87a9c085f.name: MTP 4.0 - Industry 4.0 for MedTech, Biotech & Pharma (SP6543)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete training course SP6543: MTP 4.0 - Industry 4.0 for MedTech, Biotech & Pharma
